data.prayer: Father, help 248 new simple churches start among the 1,244,800 people in the county of Lijiang, Yunnan, China. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lijiang, Yunnan, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Lijiang words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Lijiang to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, the believers in the county of Lijiang, Yunnan, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Nisu, Northwestern people.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Lijiang, Yunnan, China not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Lijiang, Yunnan, China.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary:
the county of Lijiang, Yunnan, China has a population of 1,244,800.

We estimate Lijiang has 94,432 people who might know Jesus, 20,110 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,130,258 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Lijiang, Yunnan, China.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
